extendedInfo.description: Looking for a company you can trust? Get it out of the Blue! Christian Attorneys, Counselors, Dentists, Doctors, HVAC Services, Home Improvement Specialists, Roofing, Schools, and much more are all found here. Currently serving Ohio, Kentucky and Indiana with businesses that strive to operate according to Biblical principles. The Christian Blue Pages app allows you to search for a business by name or category. You can view local area providers who are waiting to serve your needs. Business contact information, coupons, and listing detail are all available. From our humble beginnings in 1991, the mission of the Christian Blue Pages has been to effectively connect consumers -- people like you and me -- to Kingdom-minded Christians in business and ministry. At the heart of this mission is our two-fold purpose: - To provide a resource that encourages the body of Christ to âput their hands to the plowâ and support each other in the marketplace, crossing the denominational, racial and ethnic lines that so often divide us as believers. (Galatians 6:10) - To provide a platform where Christians in business can âshine their lightâ (Matt 5:16) in the marketplace to believers and non-believers alike.

reviews.title: Christian Blue Pages
reviews.comment: Like the anytime & anywhere access to Christian products, services & those who provide them.  Enjoy using the Christmas. Blue Pages to go Caroling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice!
reviews.comment: Once they get more vendors in my area it will be a great app!
reviews.author: Amanda Langford

reviews.title: Not in my area
reviews.comment: Only has about 10 areas, would love if  this would expand greatly.
reviews.author: A Google User
